Josh Kissel

Connecting Users Through Design

Meet Me

Josh Kissel

I've spent the past six years studying graphic design but I'll never be done learning! In that time I've found my passion is crafting design experiences that bring people together; no matter the medium.

I classify myself as a Visual Designer and Ui Developer. This skillset means that I conduct user interviews, lead design ideation sessions, build wireframes, design static user interfaces and then develop front-end web-solutions. While I focus on designing digital solutions I like to get my hands on a little bit of everything.

Over, the past five years I've been very fortunate to hold 5 very different internship experiences. Additionally, I've been lucky to contract with a diverse range of clients. Leading me to have experience in: screenprinting, pre-press, social-media management, branding, packaging, environmental design, web design and web development.

Contact forms suck
